channel.title: Total Level & Menu Text gone astray
channel.description:
[img]http://i983.photobucket.com/albums/ae318/dom1993z/untitled.jpg?t=1281899232[/img] As you can see the total level is completely wrong and this definitely client sided because I've tried with other clients and it worked fine. I can't seem to find out how to fix it.
Also the menu text appears on the skill tab towards the bottom right, what is the cause of this?

item.title: Total Level & Menu Text gone astray
item.dc:creator: @Xyger Xyger
item.description:
@Xyger wrote:

Fixed. Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Total Level & Menu Text gone astray

item.title: Total Level & Menu Text gone astray
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

You have made that interface with the same ids as some of the things on the skill tab, so it is interfering with them.

I suggest make your interface about 100 - 200 ids higher

Read full topic
item.source: Total Level & Menu Text gone astray
